Specific Details: Seven members of Cavan Chamber met with Minister Humphreys to discuss matters of local development in Cavan Town
DPOs Lobbied: Heather Humphreys|Minister|Department of Arts, Heritage and the Gaeltacht::Joe O'Reilly|Senator|Seanad
Subject Matter: Seven members of Cavan Chamber met with Minister Humphreys to discuss matters of local development in Cavan Town
Intended Results: Gain insight into government plans for Cavan Town and environs particularly in light of BREXIT,::What are the government going to do for local investment and creating jobs in Cavan
Lobbying Activities: Meeting took place on Cavan Chamber offices on October 21st 2016.  Sen Joe O'Reilly also attending|Meeting|1
Person primarily responsible for lobbyin: Eddie Coleman, President, Cavan Chamber of Commerce

Specific Details: Lobbied attendees on the importance of land mobility and the need to fund the Land Mobility Service at the launch of the Land Mobility Service pilot programme report 2014-2016.
Subject Matter: Lobbied attendees on the importance of land mobility and the need to fund the Land Mobility Service at the launch of the Land Mobility Service pilot programme report 2014-2016.

Lobbying Activities: Event took place in Buswells Hotel, Dublin.|Event / Reception|1
